channel.title: Amadeuse Launcher News
channel.description: Latest news and updates for Amadeuse Launcher

item.title: Welcome to Amadeuse Launcher!
item.description:
Welcome to Amadeuse Launcher!

We're excited to announce the launch of Amadeuse Launcher with three carefully curated modpacks:

  • Minecraft 1.21.4 Vanilla - Experience the latest Minecraft features in pure vanilla
  • Minecraft 1.12.2 Hypixel Optimized - Perfect for Hypixel gaming with Controllable mod and performance optimizations
  • Minecraft 1.20.1 Fabric Performance - Maximum performance with Sodium, Lithium, and Iris shaders

Join our Discord community for support and updates!

item.title: Modpack Updates Available
item.description:
Modpack Updates

All modpacks have been updated with the latest mod versions and performance improvements.

The Hypixel Optimized pack now includes enhanced controller support and better FPS optimization.
